Detailed Targeting

Top Targeted Audiences

The chart below displays the most utilized targeting criteria by political parties on Meta, based on the amounts spent. The top focus groups predominantly target interests such as ‘books’ or ‘politics.’

  • 26 okt - 24 nov 2023
  • 18 nov - 24 nov 2023

Top Excluded Audiences

Among the detailed options offered by Meta, the chart below shows the most excluded target audiences per party. The ranking is based on the amounts spent. Most focus groups are focused on interests such as ‘books’ or ‘politics’.

  • 26 okt - 24 nov 2023
  • 18 nov - 24 nov 2023

Top Contested Audiences

The charts below show the target audiences where most competition takes place. For example, the groups in which all parties invest large amounts to reach voters with the same interests.

  • 26 okt - 24 nov 2023
  • 18 nov - 24 nov 2023
